mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_CREATE_DT, BOARD_MODIFY_DT, SIGNAL, HIT , EMP_NO, EMP_NAME , ATTACH_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CASE WHEN NO.SIGNAL = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, NOTICE_NO ${sort}) AS RN , NO.NOTICE_NO, NO.BOARD_TITLE, NO.BOARD_CONTENTS, NO.BOARD_CREATE_DT, NO.BOARD_MODIFY_DT , NO.SIGNAL, NO.HIT , EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_ATTACH ATC WHERE NO.NOTICE_NO = ATC.NOTICE_NO) AS ATTACH_COUNT FROM EMPLOYEE EMP INNER JOIN NOTICE_BOARD NO ON EMP.EMP_NO = NO.EMP_NO ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT NO.NOTICE_NO, NO.BOARD_TITLE, NO.BOARD_CONTENTS, NO.BOARD_CREATE_DT, NO.BOARD_MODIFY_DT, NO.SIGNAL, NO.HIT , EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE EMP INNER JOIN NOTICE_BOARD NO ON EMP.EMP_NO = NO.EMP_NO WHERE NO.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
